title: Straight razor shave for real men?  or douchebag hipsters?
body:
What do you think?  Arguments for and against?

The straight razor (incase you didn't know what it was): 
https://catherinesherman.files.wordpress.com/2008/06/dsc_0692-1.jpg


I personally use a straight, but not to make myself a extra manly man or a hipster...
